overview: "Hello Kitty- Becomes a Princess" features 5 Hello Kitty animated cartoons which were originally featured in "Hello Kitty's Furry Tale Theater."  1- Cinderkitty  2- Kitty Locks and the Three Bears  3- Sleeping Kitty  4- Kitty and the Beast  5- Snow White Kitty and the One Dwarf
tagline: Fall under the spell of Hello Kitty in these happily-ever-after tales!
title: Hello Kitty Becomes A Princess
